contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 26, 2015 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK Band adjudicator: Owen Farr. Solo adjudicator: Stuart McAuley.
Hymns were drawn on the day from a list of 5 from '120 Hymns for Brass Band'; numbers 1 ('Aberystwyth'), 7 ('Blaenwern'), 38 ('Hyfrydol'), 68 ('Penlan'), 85 ('St. Denio'). Three verses maximum.
Winning conductor: Raymond Tennant
Best Fife A Band: Kingdom Brass Best Fife B Band: N/A
Best first section: Newmilns and Galston Best second section: Perthshire Brass Best third section: Campbeltown Brass Best fourth section: Bon Accord B
Best cornet: solo cornet, Kingdom Brass Best horn / flugel: horn, Dalmellington Best euphonium / baritone: euphonium, Bon Accord Best trombone: Bon Accord Best basses: Dalmellington Best percussion: Bon Accord
Sept. 27, 2015, 8:18 a.m. Sept. 27, 2015, 2:20 p.m.
1 Kingdom Brass Raymond Tennant Harmony Music
2 Bon-Accord Silver Band Steve Malcolm Music for Battle Creek
3 Newmilns and Galston Band Alan Cameron Variations on a Ninth
4 Dalmellington Band Archie Hutchison Of Distant Memories
5 Clackmannan and District Band Lynda Nicholson Dances and Arias
6 Granite City Brass Bruce Wallace Sounds
7 Bo'ness and Carriden Band Charlie Farren Elgar Variations
8 Tullis Russell Mills Paul Drury Connotations
9 Coalburn Silver Band Gareth Bowman Connotations
10 Perthshire Brass George Annan Jnr Olympus
11 Broxburn and Livingston Brass Chris Shanks Mountain Views
12 Dunaskin Doon Band Gary Williams Renaissance
13 Campbeltown Brass Gordon Evans Variations on Laudate Dominum
14 Langholm Town Chris Shanks The Dark Side of the Moon
15 Bon-Accord Silver B Band Jennifer Cook Variations on Laudate Dominum
16 Newland Concert Brass (Bathgate) Paul McKelvie Variations on Laudate Dominum
17 Whitburn Heartlands Chris Bradley Visions [Price]
18 Tullis Russell Intermediate Band Dean Bromage Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
Withdrawn Dunfermline Town Andy Shaw
